Plot: Follows Nina, a professional documentarian, and her crew as they chronicle the acting process of Andrea, a young and successful theatre performer, in her first major role in a feature film. Andrea's process becomes risky as she is encouraged to delve deeper into the dark reality of her character. Nina is there to record everything as the line between what is real and what is performance becomes dangerously blurred.
Title: A Method

Plot: A chaotic day of foolishness at a small church takes a pastor to the edge of insanity.
Title: Church Foolishness 2013

Plot: Experimental film based on the works of John Cage.
Title: Second Chances EmptyCage

Plot: Throughout her life, Jane has held onto things that belong to others. When almost everyone close to her lets her down, Jane soon learns that you can't expect everything from everybody. Slowly, Jane begins to accept the fact that people are human, and humans screw up sometimes. And that's okay.
Title: Things Found on the Ground

Plot: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife?
Title: Gone Girl

Plot: Actor Riggan Thomson is most famous for his movie role from over twenty years ago of the comic book superhero Birdman in the blockbuster movie of the same name and its two equally popular sequels. His association with the role took over his life, where Birdman is more renowned than "Riggan Thomson" the actor. Now past middle age, Riggan is trying to establish himself as a true artist by writing, directing, starring in and co-producing with his best friend Jake what is his Broadway debut, an adaptation of Raymond Carver's story, What We Talk About When We Talk About Love. He is staking his name, what little artistic reputation that comes with that name and his life savings on the project, and as such will do anything needed to make the play a success. As he and Jake go through the process of the previews toward opening night, Riggan runs into several issues: needing to find a replacement for the integral supporting male role the night before the first preview; hiring the talented Broadway name, Mike Shiner, for that role, Mike who ends up being difficult to work with and who may end up overshadowing Riggan in the play; having to deal potentially with a lawsuit based on one of his actions to ensure success; needing to be there for his daughter, Sam, who he has hired to be his production assistant and who has just come out of drug rehab; and pleasing the New York Times critic, Tabitha Dickinson, who wants to use any excuse to give the play a scathing review which in turn would close the show after the opening night performance. But Riggan's biggest problem may be his own insecurities, which are manifested by him constantly hearing what he believes to be the truth from the voice of his Birdman character, who he often battles both internally and externally.
Title: Birdman Or The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance

Plot: Hank Palmer is a successful defense attorney in Chicago, who is getting a divorce. When His brother calls with the news that their mother has died, Hank returns to his childhood home to attend the funeral. Despite the brittle bond between Hank and the Judge, Hank must come to his father's aid and defend him in court. Here, Hank discovers the truth behind the case, which binds together the dysfunctional family and reveals the struggles and secrecy of the family.
Title: The Judge

Plot: 'It's just getting started' when we take a glimpse back at 'The Horrible 4', with the murder of Michael's friends and girlfriend by Charles, the kid they made fun of. 'The Horrible 4: Resolution' follows Michael, four years after all the death. Michael is trying to start over. He has new friends, but now his friends are found slaughtered with no one to blame, lovers disappear and a killer on the loose. . No one is safe. He has to figure out who the killer is and help himself and the friends he has left survive. Will anyone make it alive? Who will be behind the mask? Will the death finally be over?
Title: The Horrible 4 RESOLUTION

Plot: Time To Fall in Love - its About True Love
Title: Time to Fall in Love

Plot: A film that attempts to walk on the fine line where reality and fiction blur together.
Title: Super Heal Me

Plot: Alex has always been afraid to fly--but one morning, while he white-knuckles his way across country to a wedding he doesn't want to attend, something changes, problems collide, and by the time he gets off the plane, and a really, really bad day is over, the last thing he wants to do is stay on the ground. Suddenly, Alex is back at the airport, buying a ticket for the first flight he can get on, then another, and then another, as he looks to reclaim his life, all without touching the ground. Shot entirely on real commercial flights, in airports and airport hotels, Fantastic Highway is a dramatic comedy about a certain kind of desperation, the search for adventure, and the fear of standing still.
Title: Fantastic Highway

Plot: Two agents try to unravel a conspiracy in a small town by donning various disguises and interviewing people they suspect may be involved.
Title: Suburban Spies

Plot: A family spends their breakfast like any other, only to lose someone they love, tragically that morning. The same moment a girl loses her boyfriend. Circumstances and luck lead the two lost souls to each other, but only to be let down by life. A tale of appreciating a good thing before its gone.
Title: A Good Thing Gone

Plot: Rocco Zanzabar, the Incontinent, the Invincible, the Infamous. Join us on his journey to finding what performance and audience means in this age of perpetual connectivity. When Internet comedian and prank celebrity Rocco Zanzabar bites off more of the world than he can chew, it leaves his cameraman/sidekick Davis Anderson and estranged wife Shirley Shakes to pick up the pieces.
Title: The Infamous Rocco Zanzabar

Plot: A tribute based on Pasha's friends particularly from the US: Arizona. The main song "Sitemail (Midnight Explanation)" gives a final message that it is ok to be a porn star when the bonding of the souls on a chat and cam show is so spiritual.
Title: The Cal Crew Sequel  Las Vegas Club Nights

Plot: Puissance De La Foi (The Power of Faith): story of a young-married couple, husband Oscar faces terminal cancer disease and given only 3 months to live. With his life at stakes, family's worries; will Oscar faith in God save him?
Title: Puissance De La Foi

Plot: A young security guard works the late shift at the Driftwood Inn along with a desk clerk and a married night maid with whom he is having an affair in whatever room is available. Unexpectedly, his brother and his lover, who used to be the guard's girl friend, show up at the motel. Turns out the two have been robbing convenience store and want the guard to join them to steal the motel safe after the Fourth of July when it will be at its fullest. Past history surfaces as jealousies mar the group's plans.
Title: Dead Dogs

Plot: A young female doctor, who operates a psychological clinic, wanted to change the world. But, when tragedy strikes in her life, the doctor becomes the patient, and she must fight against her mind in order to keep her husband's memory alive.
Title: Diverting

Plot: An out of work good citizen and seasoned Karate instructor must take the law into his own hands to stop a gang of armed robbers from terrorizing the city.
Title: Monrovia on Fire

Plot: Rage. Lost. Random lantern. A young outcast wonders around desolate trailers and broken houses in search of something.
Title: To Off the Ponder Into

Plot: A tormented young woman teams up with an eccentric house-painter and learns how to vent her childhood rage in a very unusual way... After losing her job and apartment, Tulip desperately looks for shelter and a means of supporting herself. Refusing to go back to her childhood home, because of bad memories, she lands in a one-room apartment with Kinard. He has lived through a childhood full of violence and cruelty and has found an unusual way to vent his left-over anger. Eventually, through trial and error, conflicting views of the world, and breaking a few laws, he shows her a path for moving on with her life.
Title: First Shoot the Lawyers

Plot: A coming of age story about a father and his 12 year old daughter who have both 'flipped the bird' to modern society to live in the woods like the 'Natives' did.
Title: If the World was New

Plot: A failed filmmaker examines a failed film that he made about a failed filmmaker.
Title: Chicks Dig It The Unfinished Opus

Plot: Where are the Doughnuts is a satirical, mockumentary film that explores the life of a teenage film producer, Esther (Annie Magan) as she attempts to herd rowdy teenagers and deal with her crush on the only actor who actually knows his lines and her ex, the pretentious director she's working for. How many doughnuts will she stress eat? Is she in control of her life? Does anyone know their lines?
Title: Where are the Doughnuts

Plot: Dusk of the Dead is a tribute to the classic horror films "Evil Dead" and "Dawn of the Dead," created by student filmmakers Nathanael King and Fernando Irizarry from June of 2012 to May of 2014.
Title: Dusk of the Dead

Plot: Chapter 2 of the Beautiful Things trilogy reintroduces us to The Man a few years after meeting. We spend a very important day at his home as he struggles to distract himself from what he knows he must do in order to deal with a recent, haunting tragedy.
Title: TIHYSG

Plot: Is there life after death? Is there a place for happiness after the war takes the future away from you? The film is about old people in a village who have no one to wait for. It is not a film about war. This film is people, losses, dreams and hopes.
Title: GreatGrandfather

Plot: Ambrosia flowers thought she was just your average girl. But life does not work out the way she expected. Her husband is tragically murdered and her life spirals out-of-control. Moving back home with mom reveals details about her identity which she is not quite ready to hear. Ambrosia discovers these truths while her mother is pressuring her into a new relationship, a strange man is stalking her, her hormones are going wild from her pregnancy along with battling the social stigma of being unwed mother, and her best friend is too self-absorbed to be of any help. In the end she discovers a truth that gives her peace, That tragedy is all around her, but so is love.
Title: Rose J

Plot: A young man has a series of strange dreams which fade further and further into reality until they are indistinguishable from his real life. Following a mind altering experience, the main character is confronted with a somewhat aloof good spirit and a much more direct evil spirit that try and point him back to reality. Meanwhile the dreams only become more intense.
Title: In the Mind of the Damned

Plot: Remember 7 is an independent absurdest comedy that revolves around the challenges of a writing contest, 'So You Think You Can Write.' Throughout the contest several short films emerge as the stories being written, while the writer struggles to remain in the televised competition.
Title: Remember 7

Plot: A nerd attempts to make a documentary about how to be cool in college and accidentally becomes a womanizer with a massive debt owed to the mob.
Title: How to be cool in College

Plot: The Liverpool-based Boswell family are experts at exploiting the system to get by in life. Despite the fact that none of the Boswells are officially employed, they manage to live a fairly good life thanks government handouts and various cash-in-hand jobs. Family life for the Boswells centres around their God-fearing Catholic mother, Nellie. With her husband having left her for "a tart", she relies upon her eldest son, Joey, to play the father's role to her other three sons, Jack, Adrian and Billy, and her daughter Aveline. Their ability to squeeze the DHSS dry, while the boys earn a living on the side, is legendary. But, although the family is the focus of their lives, they each have different reasons to be unhappy!
Title: Bread

Plot: Ray Steppin, a small-town sheriff in the mountains of Syzygy County Alaska is awakened early one morning with a hangover of steep proportions. He's summoned to the gruesome crime scene where a bevy of bodies have been found at a remote cabin; and one is still breathing. As the investigation deepens and night begins to fall, it becomes more and more clear that what Ray and his deputies (and the local coroner/priest) are up against isn't natural and that nothing is what it seems.
Title: Til Night Redux

Plot: "Mix" and his brother, a former "M.O.A. agent named "Rico" are hired by "General Morrow" to locate a satellite that has fallen out of the sky. NSA and former Agent G2 is also searching for the missing data box before it self destructs, in 24 hours. Mix thinks is a portal device, but in actuality it is a signal beacon for an ancient alien satellite.
Title: In 24Hours

Plot: A quiet man who suffer from multiple personality disorder is talked into stop taking his medications by his parents, who are sure he is fully healed. He agrees to stop taking them for a week, and that unleashes all his other personalities to destroy his life.
Title: Best of Seven

Plot: An experimental interpretation of a classic voyage tale, an ambiguous and unknown narrator recounts her outward journey and internal transformation as she travels through Northern India.
Title: Blue Requiem

Plot: Simon Has Been Abused By Women Nearly All Of His Life. It Was Until He Meet Rachael Is Gothic Friend. Sharing A Interest Within Torture And Murder The Pair Decided That Maybe They Should Hunt Down Five Women Who Hurt Simon When He Was Younger With A Twist That Will Effect Anyone Who Knows Simon.
Title: Killing for Rachael

Plot: Surrogative follows Quinn Wyler and Daniel Vance, a same sex couple, as they pursue parenthood through a surrogacy organization; focusing on how starting a family and selecting the mother of their child weighs on their relationship with one another.
Title: Surrogative

Plot: The trials & tribulations a computer repair company goes through when outside influences are trying to cause its demise
Title: Its Only Business

Plot: How Baby Dominic gets involved with bank robbers is how all the fun begins in Baby Takes A Ride; Dominic's First Picnic. This very funny family comedy is about a baby, a picnic, and a bank robbery. Shot on location on Florida's East Coast, Baby Takes A Ride shows off the beautiful Indian River Lagoon, and historic downtown Vero Beach. Directed by Vicenzo Vermicelli and featuring veteran professional actors, this Mashed Potato Players original comedy full length feature movie is intended to please audiences of all ages. The Mashed Potato Players have been entertaining families since 1978 and many of the actors in 'Baby' have performed on stage and screen for years adding to the ensemble performance style of directing Vincenzo Vermicelli likes best. Excellent!
Title: Baby Takes a Ride

Plot: A meek word processor impulsively travels to Manhattan's Soho District to date an attractive but apparently disturbed young woman and finds himself trapped there in a nightmarishly surreal vortex of improbable coincidences and farcical circumstances.
Title: After Hours

Plot: Epileptic drummer finds himself in a web of lies and love triangle trying to hide his illness.
Title: Triste Edad

Plot: Three teens are forced to spend the night at the house on Hollow Road. They eventually learn that each one of them has been having recurring nightmares. Nightmares that could only take place in the mind of a psychopath.
Title: Nightmare in Psycho Town

Plot: In the mid-1990s, two inmates bury the burned bodies of two lifers at Mississippi's infamous Parchman Farm; a third old-timer relates their story. They'd served 65 years for a murder they didn't commit, framed by a local sheriff while buying moonshine whiskey for a Manhattan club owner to whom they owed money. In flashbacks we see this odd couple thrown together (Ray is a fast-talking con man, and Claude is a serious man about to start work as a bank teller), the loss of Ray's watch (sterling silver, from his daddy), the murder and trial, the hardships of Parchman, and the love-hate relationship of Claude and Ray as they spend 65 years bickering and looking for a way to escape.
Title: Life

Plot: Twenty-five years ago an experimental drug called doxital saved Eric Shepherds life. Doxital could grow back severed limbs and bring life back to the newly dead. Doxital was legalized and made available for public use. The doxital that was sold to the public spoiled and turned those who took it into the walking dead. The dead are harmless and walk among the living. Now the time has come for the dead and the living to part ways.
Title: Dead Is Dead 25

Plot: A 17 year old boy leaves his aunt's house to find special buses.
Title: Trolleybus Island

Plot: This is a tragic-comedy based on the true story of an international theater troupe trying to survive in the city of Bangkok, a city dedicated to business and thirsty of money. During a theater play, a wealthy Thai girl in search for herself, discovers the beauty of theater and decides to leave her bright future as a business manager in order to become an actor. Unfortunately, the life of the company is not easy and, despite her efforts to do well, she brings in elements of tension to the theater troupe. After many adventures that even have the 'capocomico' to be jailed, the Thai girl disappears dramatically during a performance, leaving everybody appalled.
Title: FU FU 99 Minutes of Life

Plot: An orphan observes surrounding cultures and learns his grandmother was a Japanese war bride.
Title: Saito Yoshiko A War Bride

Plot: A young couple host a dinner party for their old college clique to find out why they grew apart. But after she locks them in her apartment and drugs them all with truth serum, Jules and the rest of her guests start to realize that some things are better left unsaid.
Title: Truth Cocktail

Plot: Three homeless men use unconventional methods to panhandle their way out of poverty.
Title: 3 Rodents

Plot: When never-famous 1980's comedian Alfred Snodoloberm takes one last shot at fame, he decides to do it the indie way - no money, no crew, nothing but himself. The result is a dark journey into the deepest depths of deluded comedy desperation.
Title: Hell Leaks Laughter

Plot: Sarah is a 17 year old girl, struggling to come to terms with the death of her best friend, Abigail. Offered the chance to get away from the rumours and recriminations that surround the death, Sarah attends a school trip to a remote farm house with a group of similarly disaffected students and their apparently caring teachers. It is on the trip that Sarah attempts to piece together the horrific events of the previous weeks that plague her and it is there that she uncovers a truth so terrifying that it threatens to plunge them all into madness.
Title: In Abigails Place

Plot: A dark comedy about a family who is coping with the repercussions of their teenage son's murder. Though the crime took place over a year ago, the accused killer has recently been exonerated and the case re-opened. It soon becomes apparent that all the affected parties have spent the past year in various forms of denial that range from desperately comical to simply desperate.
Title: The Water in the Bay

Plot: The things you never had, you lose them too.
Title: Word for Word

Plot: The New TV show, UK Ghost Hunts. A UK Paranormal team, take you and the public on an unforgettable journey into the paranormal. A truly unique ghost hunting TV series where you the public are the stars of the show. Visit and learn about the most haunted buildings in United kingdom and learn there reports of paranormal activity.
Title: UK Ghost Hunts

Plot: Sad Silk Sunday" is the story of people going their own way. Catherine Parker was a young vibrant woman, tragically killed by a drunk driver one night. Following her funeral, one Christmas Eve the people in her life go their own way. Shot in four individual sections, the film follows Catherine's sister, father, sisters ex lover and and her childhood friend.
Title: Sad Silk Sunday

Plot: A camera crew goes behind the scenes of a new film called Bruize. What follows is a hilarious reveal of one of the most inept film production teams of all time. Join Charlie Maple, Gustavo Cabrera, Dustin Stanley, and Jordan Sprayer as they to salvage this train wreck of a film.
Title: Bruize

Plot: The film is the story of Richard and his gambling problem. Addiction is the theme of the film, the compulsion to win and escape from his reality are the key elements of the story. What begins as an innocent game of dominoes has become the worst hand of Ricardo's life! How far can a player go when the addiction for one more game is the only thing in his mind? In one night, Ricardo will have the game of his life. Literally he can win or lose it all! How can a compulsive gambler stop if he is not aware of his passion-addiction? Even when his whole life is seen falling in front of him?
Title: Cierre a Blancas

Plot: Colleen and Walter decided to get married at a science fiction convention. Their second mistake was asking Jerry to film the whole thing.
Title: The Marriage of Maid ShonDa and GNarr the Victor

Plot: A mysterious musical about the 2nd coming of Jesus Christ and the emergence of the Anti-Christ in the ends of time. References to the current whereabouts of the Anti-Christ and a collection of rituals to call Jesus.
Title: The New World Order Art Thriller Christ Rituals

Plot: Mafia daughter Suki finds herself at the wrong end of a drug deal and left for dead. New love Roy moves in to sweep her off of her feet and save her life. Together, they decide to strike back at the person responsible for Suki's near death experience: her mother.
Title: A Thought Unchained

Plot: Jake hates his middle management job, so Jake quits his job, just as his entire company is quarantined inside the warehouse where they work. Now he's trapped inside with the people he so desperately wants to get away from. With resources running slim, people begin to turn on each other, and battle lines are drawn. Now his only hope of escape is to solve the mystery of the quarantine, and unite his former co-workers before they tear each other apart. He just wanted to leave it all behind, but before the night is out, he may end up finding what he was looking for all along.
Title: Weekenders Present Quitter

Plot: Cold Kate is a motivational story of a young female attorney who has to battle her case outside of the courtroom.
Title: Cold Kate

Plot: A young Vermont widow is haunted by the memory of her dead husband, while dealing with her family, employer, and other residents of her small town.
Title: Bereft

Plot: Beautiful and successful television news anchor Melanie Adams falls in love with renowned heart transplant surgeon Peter Hallam. After a whirlwind courtship, they marry. Each has children from previous marriages. The strain of a new marriage and attempts to blend a family jeopardize their happiness.
Title: Changes

Plot: Albert is an introverted travel agent living a lonely life in New York. When Louie, his best friend from childhood, appears having just escaped from prison, Albert's quiet existence is permanently disrupted. what ensues is one long, crazy night in New York that will change both their lives forever.
Title: On the Run

Plot: A young woman finds herself on an unexpected journey and re-discovers who she is.
Title: The Road to Awe

Plot: In an oppressive future, three prisoners find consolation in each other as they wait for execution. Two are political prisoners; one is a murderer at the mercy of his rage. Can they help him make peace with himself before they all die?
Title: The Hour Before Morning

Plot: After being dumped by his girlfriend, Bass' is set up on a series of dates. This only seems to push him closer to his neighbor and friend, Sheila
Title: Til Love Comes

Plot: From the team that brought you "Headsmash", comes a new feature length, coming of age comedy. When Patrick (Levi Robinson), and Ethan (Jordan Howard), write "Till Blood Do Us Part", the greatest screenplay of all time, the two high school cheap skates must find a way to turn their paper dreams into a celluloid reality. Joined by their skeptical friend, Tom (Chet Watson), the trio stumbles upon a 30 year old crime that may, or may not lead them to the treasure they have been waiting for. Together, the boys hit the road. Along the way, they run across an array of wacky characters, outrageous situations and perhaps find the true meaning of friendship.
Title: Till Blood Do Us Part

Plot: Hudson Milbank is a successful Hollywood screenwriter who suddenly and strangely finds himself without any emotional feelings. He tries doctor after doctor and shrink after shrink, but nothing works. The Golf Channel, lesbian exercise classes and a dizzying variety of pills get him through the day, but don't quite solve his problem. His writing partner tries everything to get him back to normal, but it's not until Hudson meets Sara that he finds a real motivation to get better and to actually start feeling again. From the writer of Deuce Bigalow, comes NUMB, a romantic comedy following an unusual man looking for strange love.
Title: Numb

Plot: Sexy Kristyna Dark has a smoking hot body, strawberry blonde hair clear to her waist, and... a deranged stalker! As Kristyna pays her first ever visit to the beautiful city of Seattle, she is unaware of the evil man watching her every move. That is until she feels a hand come down hard over her mouth, and kicking and screaming, she is locked into the trunk of her own car and driven away! Soon the frightened blonde finds herself totally bound and gagged and at the mercy of a madman! He strips off her clothes and gropes her breasts over and over again as she squirms and moans in fear! Kristyna is totally helpless as her captor binds her sweet body time after time! She is hauled into a dungeon he has created just for her where her bondage continue. When he has had enough of her for the moment, she is locked into a wire cage, still stringently bound and tightly gagged and left for the night! Next day, with her captor gloating that she was going to be his slave forever, Kristyna knows her only hope of survival is escape. But he never leaves her unbound for a moment and escape seems impossible! Can she somehow get away? Will she even survive? Find out in the thrilling and shocking conclusion of "Stalked in Seattle!"
Title: Stalked in Seattle

Plot: BLITZFOOD probes the downward spiral of self-destructive collapse for volatile lost soul - Perigrin Ship. Haunted in every aspect of his baleful life, Peri staggers through a nervous maze of personal disasters, subjecting his heart to a lacerating baptism of unholy fires. Could this suffering be transformative?
Title: Blitzfood

Plot: A group of misfit drama graduates struggle to deal with life, love and bad career choices, in order to achieve their ambitions to succeed.
Title: An Actors Guide to Resting

Plot: A loner burdened by the obligations of his sick mother and clingy sister develops a bizarre and perverse relationship with his camcorder.
Title: The Dead Deads

Plot: NOTE: You may be taken through a brief spell-check if some words are not recognized.
Title: OOolah

Plot: Jack and Molly are forgetting why they got married. They live under the same roof, but live different lives at different times. Molly is smart in every sense of the word, and sometimes the way she sees Jack smarts. He's a liability, an embarrassment, and her last desperate hope is that the influence of Dara will help straighten him out. Jack works night shift for a CCTV company. He has big dreams of being a web designer. He sees life as a game, and he's still trying to get to the next level. Dara comes to get qualifications to further her practice. Molly trusts Dara to change Jack, to prove to him that he's wrong. But Dara has needs of her own.
Title: Dara Says

Plot: Jack and Beth have known each other for a while now, but after having a night of ill advised passion, they're not sure their friendship can ever be the same. Goaded by their friends Sean and Jessica to tell them every sad little detail, they struggle to keep their heads held high in a world of post coital judgment.
Title: Goodish

Plot: Four days in the life of a misanthropic, highly opinionated, politically incorrect and unemployed young man whose biggest priority in life is to drink beer with his friends, stay away from trouble and never make money a reason for worry. The film starts on a Monday and makes it's way backwards through Sunday, Saturday till Friday, illuminating the douchey side of each character through their opinions, actions and facebook interactions. Feel free to rate the characters on their douchiness.
Title: The Douchebags

Plot: When the past is in the present.
Title: Rootz the Breakthrough

Plot: La Pequena Voz is an adaptation focused on a Latino immigration story that reveals the social fabric and immigration issues as seen in America in current day. Based on Victor Hugo's Les Miserable, La Pequena Voz is the story of an immigrant's quest to find freedom and prosperity in America. This updated modern day take on Les Miserable stands to give a voice to the countless hard working immigrants who come to America in search of a better life, only to be persecuted and marginalized.
Title: La Pequena Voz

Plot: Anthony, a middle-aged man more or less satisfied with his life, suddenly finds himself getting a divorce - initiated by the until recently concealed anger and unhappiness of his wife, Katherine. This devastating turn of events forces him to face challenges on many fronts, as he struggles to redefine himself as a father, a man living alone, and a man with a future he can believe in. His anger and confusion slowly transform into acceptance and determination as he builds a life for himself in this new world.
Title: Anthony Lost  Found

Plot: A series of loosely connected skits that spoof everyday life in a quiet little fake town. Stoners, rock stars, wizards, feisty Latinas, shiny spandex, bumbling detectives and a plethora of peculiar people come together in this twisted sketch comedy follow-up to the infamous comedic masterpiece, 'Craptastic.'
Title: Craptastic Number Two

Plot: April Grant Always Had A Happy Life She Did Well Within Her Life Everything Went Well Until One Strange Night Out With Her Friends Everything Changed When They Discover A Strange Box On The Beach. Unaware That What Inside Is About Change Everyone Life And Leave Nothing But Bloodshed Her Only Connection A Man Named Albert Who Her Stalker Is Looking To Find But Her Stalker Isn't Anything Anyone Has Ever Seen Before She Has The Powers To Copy The Forms Of Other People And Will Stop At Nothing To Kill April Or Her Friends.
Title: Her Name Is Pinky

Plot: A tormented young woman teams up with an eccentric house-painter and learns how to vent her childhood rage in a very unusual way... After losing her job and apartment, Tulip desperately looks for shelter and a means of supporting herself. Refusing to go back to her childhood home, because of bad memories, she lands in a one-room apartment with Kinard. He has lived through a childhood full of violence and cruelty and has found an unusual way to vent his left-over anger. Eventually, through trial and error, conflicting views of the world, and breaking a few laws, he shows her a path for moving on with her life.
Title: Hard Mend

Plot: 28 year-old writer, James McQueen, senses life passing him by. Sapped and demoralized from constant struggle and rejection, he takes a job at a publisher to prove himself to his family and save his relationship. Sensing a different route to achieving his ambitions, James instead becomes immersed in an alternately comic and brutal game of corporate cat and mouse. As his personal life also unravels, he faces a bittersweet journey to reconcile his ambitions and discover what love and life is really about.
Title: Fifty Fifty Ball

Plot: The staff of a small university affiliated hospital navigated the slippery slope of shepherding a experimental cancer drug through it's clinical trials. Told through the eyes of the Physician, the Clinical Research Coordinator, a Research Assistant and the Chair of the Institutional Review Board; The Research Clinic shines a light on the difficult ethical decisions all of them face in their personal and professional lives.
Title: The Research Clinic

Plot: Detective James is trapped in a world of drinking and disbelief after he fails to change laws to protect our children. James has fallen from the grace of GOD while trying to understand how a team of kidnappers took his only god daughter Maddison from him. Not believing in his spiritual gifts to find missing children A high ranking pedophile name Natas is a villain that swore to get revenge after being arrested by detective James in the past. Natas has formed a team of local kidnappers and pedophiles to help keep the promise of taking children and destroying the lives of people surrounding detective James. Having nowhere to turn detective James ask GOD for help with a prayer from his heart. Not knowing that GOD had answered his prayers James met two detectives that specialize in finding missing children and tracking down criminals to help change the laws of the land. Now having a team of his own detective James finds grace and goes on a man hunt to take down Natas and his gang of kidnappers and pedophiles. After finding solid evidence that his god daughter Maddison is still alive after 3 years. Detective James is seeking to find Maddison before Natas spills her blood of innocents. Join us as we venture into the life of a Detective fighting his way to change the laws of the land while taking down kidnappers and pedophiles that prey on our children. The Blood of Innocents is a story based on true events
Title: The Blood of Innocents

Plot: Empirica is a neo Americana road film about two estranged brothers, one over medicated and the other home from war in the Middle East. They leave their home in North Carolina on an all out cross country scramble in a beat up 57 Chevy to make a new life for themselves in what they believe to be the land of opportunity: California. They left for freedom, though what they found...they'll never forget.
Title: Empirica

Plot: This movie has been made with no budget about DANO, a film graduated, drives taxi as his job. He tries to make a film beside his job, but the sponsor lets him down. As the project failing he decides to make the film by himself, but he and his wife get into a relationship matter. He tries all his best to start making the film, however he needs to solve his family matter first.
Title: Dano

Plot: In the wake of a friend's passing, Alex must make due as best he can and turns to art as a means of self-expression through which he may better understand the world.
Title: Fragments of a Memory

Plot: Two sisters try to come to terms with their past, while striving to understand the uncertainty of the present.
Title: Uncertain Relations

Plot: 'Who Are You (Glendale Edition)' is main compilation that sparks of the rest of the six movie compilations. All movies follow two story lines; to win your first love and the story of 'The Curse' of how Pasha saves the witch with the power of faith. The Glendale Edition reveals Pasha's obsession with Caucasian women being his first love.The message follows to go for your first love and "don't go for the second best" if you cannot avail it put it to the test. Pasha explains his first love is the "Caucasian" who the evil witch interferes with. The Madonna Message: Pasha derives his thematic message in his remixed music videos of 'The Curse' from Madonna's 'Express Yourself' music video. Pasha presents this message through french subtitles in his videos 'Don't go for second best'. 'Put your love to the test'. As well as the vocals are performed harshly, violently and dominantly to put the message through to win your first love rather than to go for the second, the second 'best' is never enough. In the remixed music video editions of "Who Are You" Pasha deliberately derives his thematic message from Madonna's 'Open Your Heart' music video. Pasha in his dance portrays himself someone wanting to love but is 'trapped' if released he 'can empower you with so much love.' 'the ability to love so greatly but trapped.' The french subtitles confirm this message. The main edit in black and white "Who Are You (Blue Toys Club Mix) music video is a medley of 'The Curse' and 'Who Are You' remixes from which the film takes off. Omer Pasha stimulates energy through dance in Who Are You (Sacramento Edition), (San Diego Edition), (Santa Monica Edition) , (Hollywood City Edit), (Santa Clara Shoot) for his all white Caucasian women and men.'The Curse Creature' derives power from Christian and Jewish rituals. 'The Curse Creature is a horror looking creature that wears a black cloak. The Curse Creature loves and believes in Jesus Christ and vividly exposes himself in the Santa Barbara Edition on 'The Curse.
Title: California Midnight Movies

Plot: For Everyone who has a dream and due to life events has that dream cut short, ordinary people doing the extraordinary to grasp success.
Title: Plan B Sediments of the City

Plot: Two idiot best friends can't catch a break. But when fate drops a loaded duffel bag into their laps, their lives could change forever. Maybe.
Title: Twenties

Plot: A comedic web series about the totally broke, totally car-less and the totally awesome. Dumped by his rich girlfriend and fired from the mail room at her father's law firm on the same day, Keith suddenly finds himself holed up in a tiny bachelor apartment, forced to fend for himself in the city of Los Angeles. Out of loneliness, desperation and pure boredom, Keith decides to shoot a web Vlog to document his attempts at getting himself together. Through the magic of craigslist, he enlists the talents of James (an inept yet overly confident, womanizing cameraman) to help him shoot this epic adventure. Step one in Keith's quest to become a fully functioning human being is to lay out a plan: 1.Get a job. 2. Get a car. 3. Get a cool girlfriend. But, as he ventures out in the city, he quickly realizes there are many obstacles standing between him and self actualization: Hard boiled cops obsessed with dealing out jaywalking tickets. Self important skinny-jean wearing hipsters who guard their turf with an iron fist and an ironic t-shirt. Tweaked out whack-a-doos who ride the #4 bus after midnight... and many more. In order to beat the odds, Keith will have to keep his wits about him and make the most of every available resource. No-one makes it alone in LA, and in Keith's case his allies come in the form of the fellow losers and underdogs of the city, whose assistance is often a double-edged sword.
Title: Walking in LA

Plot: "Cos, Play, Life" is about Wes and Julie, who meet while at a speed dating social event. After deciding that they would like... to get to know each other better and start dating. After Julie reveals to Wes that she is a passionate cosplayer, they go through the twists and turns that come at them from both friends and family.
Title: Cos Play Life

Plot: Stella is a young poet living in Los Angeles with her three intellectual artist friends. The group spends their time getting drunk and arguing about academic theories. One day, Stella goes missing amidst a wave of mysterious murders in their neighborhood. Her three friends must now put their intellectual disagreements aside to sort out the clues Stella might have left before her disappearance.
Title: The Fifth Sun

Plot: The Krozley Team deals with past problems that cause a rift within the team. Meanwhile AJ Kocher discovers a device designed by Nikola Tesla the legend says it is able to talk to spirits unfortunately the Krozley's learn that it raises the dead.
Title: Paranormal Chasers Ghostly Guest

Plot: An 18-year-old girl suffering with depression and a 24-year-old man suffering with Intermittent Explosive Disorder discover how love, parental pressure, and the overall stigma to be 'cool' can ruin a relationship.
Title: Skaza

Plot: 'Our Tokyo' is a feature-length piece that explores the realities of modern-day Japan - at once seeking to remove clichés, while painting an honest portrait of this unique and vibrant nation.
Title: Our Tokyo

Plot: Six friends are broken apart when a girl develops a crush on one of them, and the other five must deal with a group of bullies while trying to find out why they had to be broken up.
Title: The Slick Clique

Plot: Aniexty Of The Mormons Tells The Story Of The Plymouth Gang Known As The Prospectors A Once Big Time Gang Who Had Around 20 People Now Reduced To A Much Smaller Number. When Becky Herbert A Member Of The Gang Returns From London The Leader Mugsey Grant Tells Her Of How Mormons Are Always Over His Door What Happens Next Is A Plan However When You Make Mistakes And Kidnap A Retired Gang Members Daughter Your Life Isn't Going To Be Perfect When He Declares Revenge On The One Who Are Responsible.
Title: Anxiety of the Mormons

Plot: When Sean writes a song that can bring the dead back to life, he thinks he's found the world's ultimate gift. But, when it falls into the wrong hands; he finds it may be time to turn off the music.
Title: Favorite Refrain

Plot: A Father , Son and Good friend set out to bring the joy to Christmas, the best way they know how, and you get to experience the fun they go through to get there. You will laugh and cry with this film.
Title: Just Like Wine the Older the Better

Plot: Adrian Weistin is going through a lot of problems that he has to over come especially some mental anguish.
Title: Vicissitudes

Plot: When Carlo Bonilla's live in girlfriend dies in a car accident she leaves behind her troubled fourteen year old son Jay. When Jay's abusive father appears Carlo is thrown into a fight he never expected. Papi's Promise, when push comes to love.
Title: Papis Promise

Plot: Our connections to the past, memory loss, and transitioning into adulthood re-told through the destruction of images.
Title: Somewhere We Lived

Plot: Anais is an actress, method acting the role of Mable, she wears the wig and talks the talk, but do others buy into this? Will the play go well, will she loose her identity and will she get confident pretending - method acting someone she is not!
Title: Loved by You Always

Plot: Alchemy in Hyde Park is the first digital feature-length fiction film shot and set entirely in the neighborhood of Hyde Park (Chicago, IL). It is an esoteric drama about four Chicagoans (Mira, Rumi, Franco, and Louise) who help one another grow through friendship.
Title: Alchemy in Hyde Park

Plot: On the day of their high school graduation 6 unlikely friends seek a graduation party at a fabled abandoned playground, after their first attempts at a party are foiled by the police. On their journey the friends encounter some colorful and dangerous characters.
Title: When Where How

Plot: Three stories of madness, bloodlust, and carnal havoc.
Title: Scrapbook of Blood

Plot: The employees of a local Tattoo shop take a day off at the lake for food, fun and drinks. As the evening progresses, ghost stories and drinking combine. One by one, each person gets taken out, until it becomes a nightmare at Blood Cove.
Title: Blood Cove

Plot: Two aspiring Documentarians travel west and meet up with Paranormal Investigators. They journey to a remote Ghost town and share their adventure and tell the story of Kirwin. Special interviews with local Historians and an acquaintance of Amelia Earhart. Unique Aerial Footage of a forgotten mining town deep in the Absaroka mountains.
Title: Kirwin the Impossible Journey

Plot: Filmed over 7 years, 'May It Happen For You' portrays the family and friends of 4 generations of women who try something new at moments of transition in their lives. Fran ( MBE June Brown) plays the matriarch, Rosemary (Jaquetta May) is her daughter, Jill (Tamzin Outhwaite) is her grand-daughter, Anna (Tamzin Merchant) is her great grand- daughter, and Cynthia (Dame Harriet Walter) is her friend. Filmed in Cape Cod and Sussex, UK.
Title: May It Happen For You

Plot: Dreams of science and God inspire and misguide an artist who leaves work and wages behind to walk and create in the woods. Attempts at spiritual awakening are dashed as he encounters angels, misfits and his own demons.
Title: A Man Full of Days

Plot: Ten characters' lives entwine over the course of one day.
Title: Common Era

Plot: The Hidden Messages of World War 3 also known as Midnight Prophecy Movies is a feature musical which depicts the signs of the end of time. The emergence of the Anti-Christ "Dajjal",the second coming of Jesus and their battle at prophesied area near Ben Gurion Airport in Israel.
Title: The Hidden Messages of World War 3 Musical

Plot: My film is a hero's journey. The heroine, after fighting her way back from a horrible life in foster care, lives life in a shell. She is pushed into a journey where she must overcome obstacles that encase her inferiority. It is through the process of dancing ballet on her own and in ballet class that the heroine, Rafaela, overcomes the obstacles presented her, and she crosses a threshold into healing , growing and solving problems and moving into an enlightened state.
Title: I Cant be Late for Ballet

Plot: Art drags through an over prescribed life that blocks him from any genuine connection. His doctor, Dr. Stackson, becomes frustrated with Art's lack of progress and decides to discontinue all of his prescriptions at once. This catapults Art into a sober world for the first time and down the road of dangerous readjusting. Meanwhile, Dr. Stackson finds himself in his own troubles when his pill partner, Isabella, tightens the screws on their business and her dog, Beans, goes missing with the only thing that links the doctor to his entire operation. Beans trots himself into Art's world and the hunt is on for Art as he must dodge drug dealers, game show hosts, and his own fears before he has a complete nervous breakdown.
Title: Finding Beans

Plot: Thomas Gideon has the heart of an artist, but he has the life of a cog, turning endlessly through days of a hostile marriage and a thankless, stalled career. Then, just as it appears things are going to get better, things get much, much worse. What is a man to do when everything he believes is a lie, when everything he has set his hopes upon disintegrates before his very eyes? This is the story of a man struggling to find his voice and his place in the world, and if he doesn't watch his step, finding himself may just cost him everything.
Title: Free Verse

Plot: An awkward loner tries to make sense of his world and comes to a tragic conclusion.
Title: Clays Rampage

Plot: GiacStudios proudly presents our first feature-length comedy, "AMERICAN MANEATER". When Adam meets Lily over an internet dating website, she's not exactly what he expects. However as time goes by, their connection and his attraction toward her grows in a way that, some could say, is "not of this world".
Title: American Maneater

Plot: A con-man living in the slums of Kibuli in Uganda is visited by his long lost brother, who brings home a lot of uncertainty and a green plastic bag full of cash. In the next couple of days, the life of the con-man and his relationships will be changed entirely due to the money.
Title: City of Dust

Plot: A movie concerned with the power of the individual in a world driven by the ideals of the collective.
Title: Common Tongue

Plot: When President Kerr and a criminal gang square off, DBC III sizzles. Written and directed by Chratt Joneskoff, DBC III includes dazzling set pieces and a fight scene that USA Today's Mike Clark calls "the greatest action scene of recent times." It also offers "the most impressive collection of actors in one movie this year" (Newsweek). Daniel Kerr, Austin Hambrick, Jeffery Johnson, Justin A. Lincoln, Zack Carlson and Tiffany Kerr are among the memorable supporting players in this tale of a brilliant crime boss (Popkoff) following the trail of his old film crew, to put together a brilliant scheme to make money off of illegal VBCs with the help of his equally brilliant editor and partner-in-crime (Jones). DBC III goes way beyond the expectations of the cops-and-criminals genre - and into the realm of pure movie masterpiece.
Title: DBC III A Saga

Plot: Marty Manson, a teen prodigy, is seeking to find success, love, and moral sanity by ensuring help from his professor, Doctor Warhol, in order for his original painting to be displayed in one of those most prestigious art museums in America. However, after meeting his new teen prodigy classmate, Veronica, he loses his track of mind and takes her through his mad antics such as drug use with low lived friends and moral questioning of the self. Taking place in the 80s, the coming of age film explores many existential topics that all teens can relate to no matter what era they're in.
Title: The Psyche of Manson

Plot: Found footage that takes place at the world's largest haunted house in Kansas City, Mo.
Title: The Poe Experiment

Plot: Holding a grudge, recovering addict Charlie Waits sets out on a course of revenge to take the life of 'Migs', a ruthless gangster that took the life of his childhood friend.
Title: Kill Migs

Plot: Set in a distant universe, the main character, Harrison was a soldier in a rebellion against a galactic organization called Atlas. However, Harrison was dishonorably discharged after he became to emotionally unpredictable when his mother died. The story begins 2 months after his discharge and 3 months after his mothers death. Harrison works for his mothers scientific research company known as the Genesis Research and Development Enterprise. Their focus is to attempt to revitalize the plant and natural life on planets where the natural has essentially died out. Harrison helps his mother's old colleagues, Dr. Camal and Dr. Anna May, with attaining rare flowers from criminals who hope to use them for illegal trading and drug use. After one of Harrison's missions goes awry, he finds a strange lost little girl, Panala, from different planet. After he agrees to take her home, Harrison and Panala soon discover that her mysterious power may become a danger not just to themselves, but to the entire universe.
Title: Deadstar the Movie

Plot: A tale of friendship and change, Cellar Story takes place over one night at a sleepover. A violent murder has occurred locally, and Kim is home alone. As a safety precaution, she calls upon her gay best friend, Justin, to spend the night. Overnight, new emotional conflicts surface, "philosophy" is discussed, and comedy ensues.
Title: Cellar Story

Plot: Lost in the woods after a roadside breakdown, Colin and June slowly lose sight of their old lives and revert to a more primal state of living. Their idyll is disrupted, however, when an older man stumbles into their life.
Title: Quivera

Plot: Donovan, an introverted AI software designer falls in love with a girl named Cora claiming to be a robot running his software. Donovan soon discovers that she does not return his feelings because she sees him as her creator and he begins to question Cora's honesty when he learns she escaped from a psychology institute. Project Cora is a "retro computer fantasy" about self discovery and what it means to be human.
Title: Project Cora

Plot: When an immature, underachieving 30-year old man is forced to grow up and get a job or risk losing his family, he dives headfirst into a job with a cult-like atmosphere and an office full of deceptive characters.
Title: 5 Steps to a Conversation

Plot: A New Bollywood Cinema with a new trend of feature long dance music videos.
Title: Omer Pasha Music Videos Bollywood Edition

Plot: Children in Manors is about freedom, love, anger and what the 1970's was like for some. This is the story of two film students documenting a day in the life of a small group of English hippies. To find out what makes them tick and how they live. Some of them have very strong political views about all the world's problems, some would rather forget the world all together and live the rest of there life out in a dream state and some turn to the power of music to express their feelings, but the one thing there all have in common is they all want change.
Title: Children in Manors

Plot: A couple travels to see the reunion concert of Led Zeppelin and discover more about themselves, and life, as they spend the nigh together.
Title: 121007 A Dogme 95 film

Plot: Simon is on a quest for love in Cambodia.
Title: Wedgetail

Plot: A few years ago, a woman known as Boss Lady, the girlfriend of a big time drug dealer named Stax O Cash, used some of his money to purchase a collection agency as another way to launder his ill gotten gains. After years of success she has now hired a full staff of workers and is ready to make SIF LLC the best collection agency in the city. The investigators at 'Dirty Launderers' have a different agenda however, bringing in hidden cameras and secret plants to bring down the corrupt agency.
Title: Skp Trcrz

Plot: Iris is a discontent acting major and resident advisor at a college in New Jersey. When a rape is committed at the dorm where she works, she becomes determined to solve the crime at all costs - even when the cops and her best friend don't believe or support her.
Title: The Year of the Phoenix

Plot: Chad Raymond is an educated man who has fallen on hard times. He conjures up every half brained reason on why society has abandoned him. That all changes when he becomes friends with his bottle of malt liquor. In what at first at seems to be a misinformed rant against himself, Chad finds the ability to overcome the odds by confronting his bottle.
Title: Broke Hallucinations

Plot: BOTANICA is a creepy futuristic black comedy that examines our complicated relationship to plant life. Sealed in a human terrarium, two unorthodox botanists and a caretaker with a penchant for erotic literature unleash a flood of unusual findings and overturn the constraints of science and social norms. This 3D narrative film is also a document of the live stage production.
Title: Botanica

Plot: Tom Tucker - a lowly MI7 agent - must work with Deb L'Etendre and Harley Davidson of the CIA to find Professor Professorson and stop megalomaniac villain Warren Peace from unleashing a nuclear missile on the world.
Title: Spyfail

Plot: God and the Devil visit Earth.
Title: Eternity for Us

Plot: One year after the collapse of civilization a lone documentary filmmaker wanders the urban and rural landscape in and around a small Midwestern city and captures on-camera the comments of 22 survivors. They describe the aftermath of civilization collapse and hopelessness of their situation waiting for the end as the climate continues to worsen.
Title: 22 After

Plot: Crime Boss Honcho gets what's coming to him, when a face from the past comes back to haunt him.
Title: Shadowblood Reckoning

Plot: A young woman, Isadora, struggles to find a new life as her elderly mother battles dementia.
Title: Just Like We Used to Do

Plot: A young, confused Pauly, copes with stress as his parents face divorce. After bumping his head (we're not in Kansas anymore), Pauly encounters an unparalleled environment where his apartment building is overtaken by alien beings out to destroy every last soul. The boy must traverse through the building like a mouse in a maze as he avoids unusual obstacles and creatures set out to defeat him. Pauly intends to save his mother while ultimately fleeing Belgium Building.
Title: Belgium Building

Plot: Private investigator Max Peregrin; a highly respected, alcoholic, cat-loving, omni-sexual Luddite, shoots and seduces his way through the (sub)urban underbelly in search of five million dollars in cash.
Title: I Know Sugar Hungry

Plot: A neorealist feature film masquerading as film noir. Noirish Project is a melancholy and gently absurd feature film about Billy, who steals his family's precious pearls and hands them over to low life Jimmy, who in turn takes them to a fence. But when the pearls turn out to be fake, Jimmy barely escapes from the fence with his life, let alone the pearls. Billy and Jimmy endeavor to get the pearls back before Billy's family finds out they're gone. But when the fence goes missing, they realize their story has only just begun. Shot in black and white, Noirish Project has an elliptical rhythm, and truthful poetic acting, rooting it firmly in the art house,
Title: Noirish Project

Plot: SURVIVAL KNIFE picks up where the typical Hollywood slasher film ends. Penny (Danielle Donahue) is the sole survivor of a vicious attack that killed five of her closest friends. To escape she was forced to brutally kill her would-be murderer. As she begins the slow process of recovering both physically and mentally, she struggles to deal with both the violence that happened to her, and the violence she committed herself.
Title: Survival Knife

Plot: Ben just wants to fall in love. But with his friends and family giving him awful advice and setting him up with incompatible dates, he may never find Miss Right.
Title: Boy Minus Girl

Plot: It would be terrifying to discover a coffin sticking out from under your home, especially a fully occupied one. Well this happens all the time in Mockbegger Newfoundland, a town that seems to have as many ghostly inhabitants as living ones. Dozens of mysterious coffins have been unearthed, housing very well preserved, but strangely dressed cadavers. McBurney Park in Kingston, Ontario looks like any other suburban park, but beneath its grassy surface lie the graves of thousands of Irish cholera victims who had come over in the death ships after the Irish famine. The gravestones are starting to emerge through the grass as are the myriad of ghosts who are haunting the park and its environs. The cries of a howling ghost still echo through the woodlands in Miramichi, New Brunswick - terrifying all those who hear it. Many believe it is the spirit of Ryan Garvon, a lumberjack during the 1920's, who when food was scarce had the misfortune of becoming dinner rather than preparing it. Explore all of these epic tales of death, murder and hauntings and more.
Title: Death and Murder Epic Ghosts and Paranormal Hauntings

Plot: Phoenix is just another "pretty face" in the hood until she decides to become an Urban model . where she discovers that her growing fame has a downside as it tests her relationships with friends and family.
Title: Watch Phoenix Rise

Plot: Love Me Anyway is a sun soaked drama about a filmmaker in love with a surfer, and a young wife exploring the greener grass of an extramarital affair with another woman.
Title: Love Me Anyway

Plot: Boyland is a coming-of-age story about a teen runaway who meets an older, reclusive photographer and unwittingly becomes the muse for his surrealistic, pederastic fantasy world.
Title: Boyland

Plot: Immersed in the sub-culture of Brooklyn, NY, a bargain between gangsters and hustlers playing the game of deceit.
Title: Artifice Loose Fellowship and Partners

Plot: A new couple's relationship takes a turn for the worst when they both love bagels a little too much.
Title: 3 Days Without a Bagel

Plot: A 19-year-old college student is kicked out of university for having contradicted his economics teacher about the meaning of the 2008 financial crisis. While establishing a plan of vengeance, he sinks into madness and deep paranoia. Adopting the Hegelian dialectic as an ideology, what seemed to be a purely personal business becomes a revolutionary aspiration, considering the use of violence as a political necessity. But the border between Good and Evil is thin, and political enthusiasm can lead to fanaticism.
Title: A Story of Negation

Plot: A story of royalty plagued by mysterious beauty, setbacks, betrayal and expectations. Dark Angels interfered in the affairs of the kingdom by granting one of their own as a gift to the childless royal family with damning consequences.
Title: Morning After Dark

Plot: Love, loss, and adoption in an LGBTQ family. A contemporary research-based drama of a mother and three daughters negotiating the challenges and politics of transnational adoption in a LGBTQ family. Harriet reluctantly gives 17-year old Luisa permission to return to the Catholic orphanage in Bogota where she spent three years of her childhood. But when she falls seriously ill, Harriet travels to Bogota with her new partner Marty to bring Luisa home.
Title: Harriets House

Plot: Jake is a down on his luck dreamer. When his musical aspirations fall short and life catches up with him in the form of a girlfriend with a new baby on the way, he is forced to reconsider his options and role as provider if he is to survive. When his longtime pal Dave - who seems to have his life together outwardly, offers Jake the opportunity of running his bar - the "Sound Lounge", things are looking up. But the daily grind of the "Sound Lounge" delivers less than expected fortune for Jake who quickly looks to other means of supplementing his income. When a shady deal goes down inside the bar, Jake is forced to come clean to Dave, enlisting his aid to get him out of a jam and save the bar. The two embark on a journey of self reflection where friendships are tested and loyalties are called into question. As truths are revealed along the way, both are forced to embrace hard choices that will effect their lives and the lives of their loved ones for years to come.
Title: Bar Time Story

Plot: A down and out young writer and a colorful private detective solve several cases during one eventful weekend in New York City.
Title: Breakthrough Weekend

Plot: Long time friends Ethan, Seth, and Johnny want to have one last hurrah before leaving for college. After discovering Ethan's house has been broken into, Seth tracks down the perpetrator and the three break into the burglar's house in an effort to get Ethan's things back. The trio decides to break into homes as a way to free themselves and remember their last Summer together.
Title: With My Eyes Closed

Plot: A killer-for-hire faces the Grim Reaper, which will determine the ultimate fate of his soul.
Title: The White Faced Man

Plot: Through interviews with survivors of the Holocaust, historical footage and photos, Voices of the Holocaust tells a story of fear, loss and tragedy but also of survival and hope.
Title: Voices of the Holocaust

Plot: Esther! For Such A Time As This is taken straight from the pages of the Bible. How can the actions of one person turn the course of history? When their bravery is a part of God's unique plan, anything is possible! A beautiful Jewish girl and a worldly Persian king become a combination which only God could use to direct the course of history for His own people. The original script and musical score ranges from uplifting joy to heart wrenching fear, as the factual events unfold. The audience will be whisked into the time period of about 480 B.C. by the exquisite costumes and elaborately created set. Filmed in Sedona, Arizona, this is an unforgettable encounter with history, and for the entire family!
Title: Esther For Such a Time as This

Plot: After murdering her friend, Kat celebrates with a party where increasingly bizarre and inexplicable events drive her to discover whether she's gone insane or something more sinister is at work.
Title: Memories Cant Wait

Plot: 'The City Don't Sleep!' is a feature-length musical delight from young director Chad Hylton. Chock-full of original songs, vibrant dances, and colorful characters, this warm, comical confection is a treat for the whole family! Presented in classic black and white, this love letter to 50s cinema tells the tale of Susan Wakefield, a budding Broadway starlet, who lands her dream role alongside her best friend, Richard. When an timely turn of events leaves Richard unable to perform and the show in need of a star, Susan's ex-boyfriend Rex seizes the role, putting Susan in the most uncomfortable position! Fall in love, sing a song and dance a jive with 'The City Don't Sleep!', the happiest musical in ages!
Title: The City Dont Sleep

Plot: A beautiful woman who has it all, great friends, loving husband, and a thriving career, finds her perfect world unraveling before her eyes as several mental illnesses lying dormant within surface, sending her spiraling out of control.
Title: Not Myself

Plot: On August 27th, 2013 Sampson became the first openly gay, black stand up comedian to headline the historic Howard Theater in Washington, DC. At this sold out show, politics,family, being from the South, drunk relatives, coming out,Paula Deen, Trayvon Martin and religion are issues of the day.
Title: That Bitch Better Funny Sampson Live at Howard Theater

Plot: It all starts in an unconventional casting scene. A man (the film's director),sitting on a bed in a dark room, is rehearsing the role of a female character such as found in Lars von Trier films. He becomes obsessed with the hysterical female character he plays. An unknown woman runs behind the camera. Then begins a journey through symbolic images from the Judeo-Christian history, as well as images of animals and themes in Lars von Trier films. The bodies of two characters, actor and director go through various emotional, physical and intense states. Between master and slave, victim and executioner, the woman seeks her femininity in the body of a young man, while he is trying to bring the woman in his body.
Title: She is Lars

Plot: Pilot for a proposed NBC sitcom about the comic misadventures of the citizens of a small southern town.
Title: Southern Fried

Plot: We follow James, a jaded and crotchety 30 year old malcontent, as he goes to work, cares for his mother, fights with his sister, and alienates everyone around him.
Title: Famous James

Plot: A gifted basketball player deals with the loss of his younger brother in dangerous ways.
Title: Side Trak

Plot: Upper West Side Story is a Hip Hop Urban Comedy Musical set in New York City. It is an adaptation of West Side Story.
Title: Upper West Side Story

Plot: An unnamed man and woman make preparations to attend a burial in a small, desolate town. After an intense argument separates the two, they find themselves isolated and in emotional turmoil. As the burial draws near, they begin to experience disturbing, surreal incidents involving manifestations of dread and despair. Abstract, dream-like sequences comprise the film, along with creative cinematography, abrasive sound design, and minimal use of spoken dialogue. A study of the human condition regarding loss, fear, and isolation, It Takes from Within is the debut feature film from writer/director Lee Eubanks.
Title: It Takes from Within

Plot: The story begins when an average, every day woman named Alex wakes up one day thinking the day will be like every other day. As she goes through her day, she notices that she's seeing the same Mysterious Man everywhere she goes. Why is he following her? What does he want? Is she being stalked? Or is she going crazy? When at last they come face to face in a heated and emotional confrontation, he reveals his true identity, and presents Alex with a unique and disquieting challenge: can she prove that her life is, in fact, worth living? If she can, she can keep her life as it is. If she can't, this may be the end for Alex.
Title: The Me That Was

Plot: When longtime best friends, Jeremy and Monica say their goodbyes before Jeremy's big move, they find themselves holding onto more than just their friendship. Separately in committed marriages, the two find themselves in an emotional shift, exacerbated by the circumstances that bring them together and alone again.
Title: Bittersweet Monday

Plot: The Long-Term Side Effect is the quirky, awkward comedy re-imagined. Lei Kelly is a survivor of pancreatic cancer. She was diagnosed at age 22 and part of an experimental treatment that cured her, but left a strange side effect: Lei has completely stopped aging. Now 40 years old, Lei still appears 22, suffering from acne and often mistaken as her teenage daughter's sister. Having spent the last 18 years obsessing over her 'condition,' Lei has completely distanced herself from the world. When her husband, unable to take her detachment any longer, finally packs his bags and walks out, Lei realizes she needs to restart.
Title: The LongTerm Side Effect

Plot: A young man finds himself completely alone in a world of beauty and mystery, but the reasons for his solitude are revealed only through self-reflection.
Title: Nestor

Plot: An indie film director, Alex, and his cocky 'action hero' friend Brad, are making a campy action film, 'Ninja vs. the Underworld.' Timid with approaching women compared to Brad's flirtatious style, Alex tries online dating. On the site he meets, Kate, a struggling young actress. Kate and Alex quickly form a connection and their friends merge social circles. In the fold is reserved sound recordist Mark, who is Alex and Brad's roommate, as well as Kate's roommates Stephanie, a petite princess and Shannon, a tough cookie. Kate is cast in 'Ninja vs. The Underworld' to play opposite Brad's Ninja hero character. Tension rises when Alex and Brad struggle for creative control over the project.
Title: Cupids Conundrum

Plot: This is the story of a guy who believes that he has the solution for preventing the human species from continuing down its current, rapid, and obvious path to total . . . and everlasting . . . extinction. And how he attempts to bring the solution to the whole world's attention. And, naturally, if you are like R.R. Persnazznur, that would mean dramatizing the solution into the format of a movie script . . . chaining that script inside a lime-green refrigerator . . . figuring out a way to get the refrigerator featured nightly on the Conan O'Brien television show . . . then inviting Steven Spielberg to 'drop by the show some night', unchain the refrigerator, take possession of the script, read it, and make the movie . . . that 'saves the world'.
Title: The Long Shot Movie

Plot: When a clandestine corporation puts a beloved wrestling company out of business, it's time for the most hated man in the locker room to bring them back from destruction.
Title: The Ashes of CHIKARA

Plot: A group of friends reunite for the first time in eight years to play a drinking game which consist of drinking one hundred shots of beer in one hundred minutes, inevitability things get f*cked up.
Title: The Century Club

Plot: Sean's death leaves behind a twin brother, a lover and a good friend. His last will and testament insists that the three get together on a road trip to plant a cross where he died and also to try and get along. His twin brother had for years distanced himself from them because he did not approve of his brother's cabaret lifestyle and the friends he kept. They set off on a road trip through Southern Africa to perform tasks laid down in the will in order to inherit from the estate. They also have to do one final task of performing as a trio, the 'Manginas' for one last show with the twin brother taking his brothers part as a drag artist.
Title: Once Upon a Road Trip

Plot: Welcome to Southtown, a city built by hustlers and fueled by their money. Everyone in this town is a hustler, or thinks they are. Three classes of individuals in the town must find a way to survive the concrete jungle.
Title: Southtown

Plot: Downcast is the story of a gang nearing its end. After ten years of criminal activity, concealed behind their suburban veneer, the wounds of their past and the pressure of new situations has begun to tear them apart. When a hit goes bad, an arms shipment disappears, and a mysterious vigilante appears - all hell looks ready to break loose. With tensions rising, it's only a matter of time before these seven people face a violent, bloody collision.
Title: Downcast

Plot: Three handsome men ponder the great existential questions of our time, consider the true meaning of love in the post-modern age, and run around chasing beautiful women. Our heroes boldly plot, theorize and scheme their way into the ever-burgeoning affections of the realm's most tantalizing lady loves, only to have fate's cruel twists foil their noble conquests. In a breathtaking journey through paradisaical realms reflecting the innermost light of their souls' desire, this quest culminates in an adventure so amazing, so wonderful and so sexy it will take all their courage to overcome what may be the most powerful force in the universe.
Title: Nincompoops

Plot: Coffin dreams is a surreal, dark romcom, thriller. When Nat wakes up in a coffin in the middle of nowhere she has no idea what's happened to her or how she will get out of the coffin. All of a sudden she passes out and wakes up back in her apartment with no memory of what just happened and a new roommate Lisa who's taken a romantic interest in her. Throughout the film we follow Nat as she tries to figure out which of the two realities is real and which one's a dream with the help of her friend Severine as she keeps waking up and passing out in the two different worlds. Can she figure it out before she lose her mind completely.
Title: Coffin Dreams

Plot: Lots of laughs when odd couple meets odd couple in 'LOVEITIS'... At first a bad bet. Then a case of mistaken identity by 'Styx and the Boys' resulting in the tremendous hospital pummeling of aristocrat prosecutor Stephen Wells pairing him with hard rock guitarist 'The Love Machine' asleep one bed over. The Machine in an effort to make good for the hospital mishap embarks on an effort to restore Stevie's happiness. Their paths cross with odd couple sisters Kimberley Ann and Cindy ironically in the same position with Kim trying to cheer up her sister after a failed marriage and suicide attempt. Machine and Kim play cupid trying to restore Stevie and Cindy's happiness with a curve ball requiring an unorthodox remedy at the end
Title: Loveitis

Plot: Nolan Grant lives his life wandering the streets as a vagrant. Something horrible happened in his past and it's when he meets a Clocker named Danny Hughes (Hunter Miller) that he is given the chance to go back in time and change things. However, as the story progresses, we learn that every character is hiding something and although Nolan has this amazing tool at his disposal, there may be too much of a risk to change anything at all. As we pursue into a world where time-travel is possible, we discover new rules and limitations to this concept we created.
Title: Counterclock

Plot: A true story of passion and political intrigue in early nineteenth century Chile, based on the memoirs of the intrepid travel writer, Maria Graham.
Title: Maria Graham Diary of a Residence in Chile

Plot: On his way home from a secret affair with Marilyn Monroe, President John F. Kennedy is attacked and turned into a vampire. As Government officials begin to notice strange happenings in the White House, they join forces with the Italian Mob to hire bounty hunter: Lee Harvey Oswald, who's been secretly taking out the country's last remaining bloodsuckers.
Title: JFK The Last Assassinated Vampire

Plot: Troubled artist Chandel ('The greatest artist in the world') and his agent Alexey as they attempt to reclaim Chandel's place at the apex of the art world.
Title: The Burden of Genius

Plot: Sons of the City is a coming of age drama set in Washington DC about Joe Young, an intelligent young man that begins to question his surroundings.
Title: Sons of the City

Plot: The film explores the complexities and many paradoxes found within the frustrations, beauty and bewilderment of life. The story is a gradually unfolding spiritual crisis, juxtaposed through two central characters: a young child, full of curiosity and wonderment, and a hard-working, 32 year-old butcher struggling to begin his own family life. It ultimately exposes the harsh social difficulties in sustaining a modest, middle-class life within the contemporary American culture of systemic decay.
Title: The Cedars

Plot: Max is uninspired with his current job as a blog writer for Hollywood Toddlers and begins writing his first screenplay. Diving into his imagination blurs the lines between what's real and what he's creating on the page.
Title: The Day I Dont Rememeber

Plot: A film about cinema masquerading as a psychological domestic drama. A marriage disintegrates after the central character witnesses his sister-in-law spiral towards a nervous breakdown.
Title: Watching the Dark

Plot: What happens when Cuffing Season is over? Can relationships hold off against the beautiful spring and summer time?
Title: Cuffing SeasonA Dramatic Comedy

Plot: A young man has it all, but feel he needs more by being with many woman. A young woman must leave her domestic relationship.
Title: Sheets of Deception

Plot: In order to save his home, Johnny Swade together with his friends, Tim, Abby, Kelly and Ariel are on a riveting journey to expose the secret dealings of a tyrant, Henry Wilmont. In pursuit of these students to prevent Wilmont's dealings exposed are his henchmen. Throughout this gripping adventure, we will learn a great deal about these five characters through their friendships, aspirations and heroics. Set in Melbourne, Johnny Swade is a feel good Aussie adventure drama-comedy film about family, friendships, responsibilities, and with lots of laugh the whole family can enjoy.
Title: Johnny Swade

Plot: A group of friends decide to go to a friends house in the woods for the weekend to party and let loose. What they do not know is that the house is located on sacred grounds and their luck is about to run out.
Title: Something to Fear

Plot: A coming of age story about Bella, a 17-year old Malawian girl. Bella wrestles with intersections of traditional life and the new role of girls in modern day Malawi, artfully juggling her various roles of daughter, sister, student, advocate and a girl who just wants to grow up. The film displays a plethora of dramatics and emotional charges expected of adolescents. The film is about true friendships, unrequited romances, school bullying, the desire to be modern, teacher-student relationships and how these impact both the students and the teachers, peer pressure, the impact of stigma and discrimination that comes with HIV/AIDS, the plight of child headed families, and how strong-mindedness and the desire to do right will always prevail.
Title: Bella

Plot: Follow the adventures of a hero, a harlot, a mystic and an innocent.
Title: Strangest Story of Six Strangers

Plot: High School--the crossroads of American adolescence. Five teenagers intersect during a day of court-appointed community service. The empty summer halls of their high school are ground zero for conflict, camaraderie, and collective soul searching. At an age when discovering who you are can be difficult, and knowing who you aren't can be deceptive.
